title: [Bug]: 1.13.0 does not work on RHEL8
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

1.13.0 pre-release does not work at all on RHEL8

### What package are you using?

rpm

### Version

1.13.0

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Download the appimage or the rpm for x86_64
2. install (if rpm) and try to run on rhel8
3. Errors out with:

rpm version:
$ teams-for-linux
 /lib64/libm.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.29' not found (required by teams-for-linux)
teams-for-linux: /lib64/libm.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.29' not found (required by /opt/teams-for-linux/libffmpeg.so)

AppImage version:
$ ./teams-for-linux-1.13.0.AppImage &
[1] 2201799
[dwb@wave Downloads]$ /tmp/.mount_teams-kxRgqO/teams-for-linux: /lib64/libm.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.29' not found (required by /tmp/.mount_teams-kxRgqO/teams-for-linux)
/tmp/.mount_teams-kxRgqO/teams-for-linux: /lib64/libm.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.29' not found (required by /tmp/.mount_teams-kxRgqO/libffmpeg.so)

It would be useful to still support RHEL8 until RHEL8 reaches end of service (2029, I think). The alternative would be to double down on getting the flatpak to work properly on RHEL8.

Thanks



...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
